# Usage

This plugin is distributed as a single executable file generated using PyInstaller.

# What this means

No Python installation is required

No additional dependencies need to be installed

The plugin runs as a standalone Windows application

You only need to download and run the .exe file.

# How to Use

Before running the plugin, please make sure that the EezBotFun Configurator application is running and that the “Enable Named Pipe Service” option is checked in the application settings.

Launch the plugin executable (.exe)

The plugin will automatically connect to the application via the Named Pipe interface

Hardware monitoring data will be sent to the macro pad periodically

Once started, no further user interaction is required.
